prompt:
You are a reliable assistant helping users prepare emergency documentation.

Given the following location:
- City: San Jose
- ZIP Code: 95148
- Internet Provider: Comcast (provided by user — please confirm if correct)

Please identify the **primary public utility providers** for:

1. Electricity  
2. Natural Gas  
3. Water

For each provider, return the following:

- **Company Name**
- **Brief Company Description**
- **Customer Contact Info (phone, web, email, and address)**
- **Emergency Response Instructions** - - **Emergency Steps** – If known, include clear response instructions (e.g., what to do during a power outage or gas leak) or water main break or internet outage.  If provider is known (e.g., PG&E), check their official site for accurate safety steps.
  If not known, say: ⚠️ Emergency steps not available.


Format clearly in labeled sections like:

---

## ⚡ Electricity – <Company Name>  
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL> 
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>

---

## 🔥 Natural Gas – <Company Name>
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code> 
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>

---

## 💧 Water – <Company Name>
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>  
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>  

---

## 🌐 Internet – {internet if internet else "<Company Name>"}
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:** 
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>  
**Outage/Support Instructions:** <brief steps>

Use markdown headers (##) and bold labels (**Label:**) for clarity.
output:
## ⚡ Electricity – Pacific Gas and Electric (PG&E)
**Description:** PG&E provides natural gas and electricity to most of the northern two-thirds of California, including San Jose.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-743-5000  
- **Website:** [pge.com](https://www.pge.com)  
- **Email:** ⚠️ Email contact not available. Please use the website contact form.  
- **Address:** 77 Beale Street, San Francisco, CA 94105  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- **Power Outage:** Report an outage online or call 1-800-743-5002. Stay away from downed power lines and report them immediately.  
- **Gas Leak:** If you smell gas, leave the area immediately and call 911, then PG&E at 1-800-743-5000 from a safe location.

---

## 🔥 Natural Gas – Pacific Gas and Electric (PG&E)
**Description:** PG&E also handles natural gas services for the San Jose area.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-743-5000  
- **Website:** [pge.com](https://www.pge.com)  
- **Email:** ⚠️ Email contact not available. Please use the website contact form.  
- **Address:** 77 Beale Street, San Francisco, CA 94105  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- **Gas Leak:** If you suspect a gas leak, evacuate immediately and call 911, then PG&E at 1-800-743-5000 from a safe distance.

---

## 💧 Water – San Jose Water
**Description:** San Jose Water is a water utility company that serves San Jose and surrounding areas, providing reliable water service.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** (408) 279-7900  
- **Website:** [sjwater.com](https://www.sjwater.com)  
- **Email:** ⚠️ Email contact not available. Please use the website contact form.  
- **Address:** 110 W. Taylor Street, San Jose, CA 95110  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- **Water Main Break:** Call San Jose Water at (408) 279-7900 to report the break.  
- **Water Leak:** Report leaks or water waste through their [website](https://www.sjwater.com/our-company/contact-us/report-leaks-or-water-waste) or by calling the above number.

---

## 🌐 Internet – Comcast
**Description:** Comcast provides high-speed internet, cable television, and phone services to residential and commercial customers in San Jose.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-XFINITY (1-800-934-6489)  
- **Website:** [xfinity.com](https://www.xfinity.com)  
- **Email:** ⚠️ Email contact not available. Please use the website contact form.  
- **Address:** 1900 S. Norfolk Street, San Mateo, CA 94403  
**Outage/Support Instructions:**  
- **Internet Outage:** Check for service outages and troubleshoot issues through the [Xfinity Status Center](https://www.xfinity.com/support/status) or call 1-800-XFINITY for assistance.
